name: SQL Injection
description: Potential SQL injection vulnerability detected in user input handling. User input is directly concatenated into SQL query without proper sanitization.
message: User input directly concatenated in SQL query

name: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in user comments section. User input is rendered without proper sanitization.
message: User input not sanitized before rendering

name: Deprecated Function Usage
description: Using deprecated function in test file. This is not a security issue but a code quality warning.
message: Using deprecated function for testing purposes

name: Hardcoded Password
description: Hardcoded password found in configuration file. This is a critical security vulnerability.

name: Missing Authentication
description: API endpoint missing authentication check. This could allow unauthorized access.
message: Endpoint does not verify user authentication

name: Unused Import
description: Unused import statement. This is just a code quality issue not a security vulnerability.

name: Command Injection
description: Command injection vulnerability in system call. User input is directly passed to system command.
message: User input passed to system command without sanitization

name: Path Traversal
description: Path traversal vulnerability in file access. User input is used to construct file paths without validation.
message: File path constructed from user input without validation

name: Weak Encryption
description: Using weak encryption algorithm. This may not be exploitable in current context.

name: Code Comment
description: Code comment contains sensitive information. This is informational only.

name: Test Data
description: Test data in test file. This is not a security issue.

name: Session Fixation
description: Session fixation vulnerability. Session ID is not regenerated after login.
message: Session ID not regenerated after authentication

name: CSRF Vulnerability
description: Missing CSRF token validation. Forms are vulnerable to cross-site request forgery.

name: Information Disclosure
description: Error message reveals sensitive information about system internals.

name: Unused Variable
description: Unused variable in code. This is a code quality issue.
